mention.text: the christian democratic international world assembly
the christian democratic international world assembly
some stubborn people who refuse to accept that people want to live peacefully
some people who are using violence to impose their ideas

this -- they have decided to kill prominent political and labor leaders so that the people blame the government -- remembering the tragedies which occurred in the past and the illegitimate governments which decided to keep , with death and repression , the privileges
-- ... criminals and we are already looking for them !
we are already looking for them
the result of many years of sacrifice
